builtInProperties.name: ACTION
builtInProperties.description: Initial action called after the installer is initialized

builtInProperties.name: ADDDEFAULT
builtInProperties.description: List of features to be installed in the default configuration

builtInProperties.name: ADDLOCAL
builtInProperties.description: List of features to be installed locally

builtInProperties.name: ADDSOURCE
builtInProperties.description: List of features to be run from source

builtInProperties.name: AdminToolsFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the directory that contains administrative tools

builtInProperties.name: AdminUser
builtInProperties.description: Set if the user has administrator privileges

builtInProperties.name: ADVERTISE
builtInProperties.description: List of features to be advertised

builtInProperties.name: AFTERREBOOT
builtInProperties.description: Indicates current installation follows a reboot

builtInProperties.name: ALLUSERS
builtInProperties.description: Determines where configuration information is stored (per-user or per-machine)

builtInProperties.name: AppDataFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the Roaming folder for the current user

builtInProperties.name: ARPAUTHORIZEDCDFPREFIX
builtInProperties.description: URL of the update channel for an application

builtInProperties.name: ARPCOMMENTS
builtInProperties.description: Provides Comments for Add or Remove Programs

builtInProperties.name: ARPCONTACT
builtInProperties.description: Provides Contact for Add or Remove Programs

builtInProperties.name: ARPHELPLINK
builtInProperties.description: Internet address or URL for technical support

builtInProperties.name: ARPHELPTELEPHONE
builtInProperties.description: Technical support phone numbers

builtInProperties.name: ARPINSTALLLOCATION
builtInProperties.description: Fully qualified path to the primary folder of an application

builtInProperties.name: ARPNOMODIFY
builtInProperties.description: Disables functionality that modifies a product

builtInProperties.name: ARPNOREMOVE
builtInProperties.description: Disables functionality that removes a product

builtInProperties.name: ARPNOREPAIR
builtInProperties.description: Disables the Repair button in the Programs wizard

builtInProperties.name: ARPPRODUCTICON
builtInProperties.description: Specifies the primary icon for the installation package

builtInProperties.name: ARPREADME
builtInProperties.description: Provides a ReadMe for Add or Remove Programs

builtInProperties.name: ARPSIZE
builtInProperties.description: Estimated size of an application in kilobytes

builtInProperties.name: ARPSYSTEMCOMPONENT
builtInProperties.description: Prevents display of an application in Add or Remove Programs

builtInProperties.name: ARPURLINFOABOUT
builtInProperties.description: URL for the home page of an application

builtInProperties.name: ARPURLUPDATEINFO
builtInProperties.description: URL for application update information

builtInProperties.name: BorderSide
builtInProperties.description: Width of the window borders in pixels

builtInProperties.name: BorderTop
builtInProperties.description: Height of the window borders in pixels

builtInProperties.name: CaptionHeight
builtInProperties.description: Height of normal caption area in pixels

builtInProperties.name: ColorBits
builtInProperties.description: Number of adjacent color bits for each pixel

builtInProperties.name: CommonAppDataFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to application data for all users

builtInProperties.name: CommonFiles64Folder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the predefined 64-bit Common Files folder

builtInProperties.name: CommonFilesFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the Common Files folder for the current user

builtInProperties.name: COMPADDDEFAULT
builtInProperties.description: List of components to be installed in the default configuration

builtInProperties.name: COMPADDLOCAL
builtInProperties.description: List of component IDs to be installed locally

builtInProperties.name: COMPADDSOURCE
builtInProperties.description: List of component IDs to run from source media

builtInProperties.name: COMPANYNAME
builtInProperties.description: Organization name of the user performing the installation

builtInProperties.name: ComputerName
builtInProperties.description: Computer name of the current system

builtInProperties.name: CostingComplete
builtInProperties.description: Indicates whether disk space costing is complete

builtInProperties.name: Date
builtInProperties.description: The current date

builtInProperties.name: DefaultUIFont
builtInProperties.description: Default font style used for controls

builtInProperties.name: DesktopFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the Desktop folder

builtInProperties.name: DISABLEADVTSHORTCUTS
builtInProperties.description: Disable generation of specific shortcuts for installation-on-demand

builtInProperties.name: DISABLEMEDIA
builtInProperties.description: Prevents registering media sources as valid sources

builtInProperties.name: DISABLEROLLBACK
builtInProperties.description: Disables rollback for the current configuration

builtInProperties.name: DiskPrompt
builtInProperties.description: String displayed by a message box that prompts for a disk

builtInProperties.name: EXECUTEACTION
builtInProperties.description: Top-level action that ExecuteAction initiates

builtInProperties.name: EXECUTEMODE
builtInProperties.description: Mode of execution that the installer performs

builtInProperties.name: FASTOEM
builtInProperties.description: Improves installation performance under specific OEM scenarios

builtInProperties.name: FavoritesFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the Favorites folder for the current user

builtInProperties.name: FILEADDDEFAULT
builtInProperties.description: List of file keys for files to be installed in default configuration

builtInProperties.name: FILEADDLOCAL
builtInProperties.description: List of file keys for files to be run locally

builtInProperties.name: FILEADDSOURCE
builtInProperties.description: List of file keys to be run from source media

builtInProperties.name: FontsFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the Fonts folder

builtInProperties.name: Installed
builtInProperties.description: Indicates that a product is already installed

builtInProperties.name: INSTALLLEVEL
builtInProperties.description: Initial level where features are installed

builtInProperties.name: Intel
builtInProperties.description: Numeric processor level when running on Intel processor

builtInProperties.name: Intel64
builtInProperties.description: Numeric processor level when running on Itanium processor

builtInProperties.name: IsAdminPackage
builtInProperties.description: Set to 1 if running from administrative installation package

builtInProperties.name: LIMITUI
builtInProperties.description: UI level capped as Basic

builtInProperties.name: LocalAppDataFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to folder containing local (nonroaming) applications

builtInProperties.name: LOGACTION
builtInProperties.description: List of action names to be logged

builtInProperties.name: LogonUser
builtInProperties.description: User name for the user currently logged on

builtInProperties.name: Manufacturer
builtInProperties.description: Name of the application manufacturer (Required)

builtInProperties.name: MEDIAPACKAGEPATH
builtInProperties.description: Relative path if installation package is not at root of CD-ROM

builtInProperties.name: MediaSourceDir
builtInProperties.description: Set to 1 when installation uses media source like CD-ROM

builtInProperties.name: Msix64
builtInProperties.description: Numeric processor level when running on x64 processor

builtInProperties.name: MSICHECKCRCS
builtInProperties.description: Installer does CRC on files only if this property is set

builtInProperties.name: MSIDISABLEEEUI
builtInProperties.description: Disable embedded user interface for installation

builtInProperties.name: MSIDISABLELUAPATCHING
builtInProperties.description: Prevents Least Privileged User patching of an application

builtInProperties.name: MSIDISABLERMRESTART
builtInProperties.description: Specifies how to shutdown/restart apps using files affected by update

builtInProperties.name: MSIENFORCEUPGRADECOMPONENTRULES
builtInProperties.description: Apply upgrade component rules during small updates and minor upgrades

builtInProperties.name: MSIFASTINSTALL
builtInProperties.description: Reduce time required to install a large Windows Installer package

builtInProperties.name: MsiHiddenProperties
builtInProperties.description: List of properties prevented from being written into the log

builtInProperties.name: MSIINSTALLPERUSER
builtInProperties.description: Requests that the installer install package only for current user

builtInProperties.name: MsiLogFileLocation
builtInProperties.description: Full path of the log file when logging has been enabled

builtInProperties.name: MsiLogging
builtInProperties.description: Sets the default logging mode for the Windows Installer package

builtInProperties.name: MsiNetAssemblySupport
builtInProperties.description: File version of fusion.dll on systems supporting CLR assemblies

builtInProperties.name: MSINEWINSTANCE
builtInProperties.description: Indicates installation of new instance with instance transforms

builtInProperties.name: MSINODISABLEMEDIA
builtInProperties.description: Prevent installer from setting DISABLEMEDIA property

builtInProperties.name: MsiNTProductType
builtInProperties.description: Indicates the Windows product type

builtInProperties.name: MsiNTSuiteBackOffice
builtInProperties.description: Set to 1 if Microsoft BackOffice components are installed

builtInProperties.name: MsiNTSuiteDataCenter
builtInProperties.description: Set to 1 if Windows Datacenter Server is installed

builtInProperties.name: MsiNTSuiteEnterprise
builtInProperties.description: Set to 1 if Windows Advanced Server is installed

builtInProperties.name: MsiNTSuitePersonal
builtInProperties.description: Set to 1 if operating system is Home (not Professional)

builtInProperties.name: MsiNTSuiteSmallBusiness
builtInProperties.description: Set to 1 if Microsoft Small Business Server is installed

builtInProperties.name: MsiNTSuiteWebServer
builtInProperties.description: Set to 1 if web edition of Windows Server is installed

builtInProperties.name: MsiPatchRemovalList
builtInProperties.description: List of patches to be removed during installation

builtInProperties.name: MSIPATCHREMOVE
builtInProperties.description: Setting this property removes patches

builtInProperties.name: MSIRESTARTMANAGERCONTROL
builtInProperties.description: Specifies whether package uses Restart Manager or FilesInUse

builtInProperties.name: MSIRMSHUTDOWN
builtInProperties.description: Specifies how to shutdown apps using files affected by update

builtInProperties.name: MsiRunningElevated
builtInProperties.description: Set to 1 when installer is running with elevated privileges

builtInProperties.name: MsiSystemRebootPending
builtInProperties.description: Set to 1 if restart of operating system is currently pending

builtInProperties.name: MsiTabletPC
builtInProperties.description: Set to nonzero value if OS is Windows XP Tablet PC Edition

builtInProperties.name: MsiUIHideCancel
builtInProperties.description: Set to 1 when install level includes INSTALLUILEVEL_HIDECANCEL

builtInProperties.name: MsiUIProgressOnly
builtInProperties.description: Set to 1 when install level includes INSTALLUILEVEL_PROGRESSONLY

builtInProperties.name: MsiUISourceResOnly
builtInProperties.description: Set to 1 when install level includes INSTALLUILEVEL_SOURCERESONLY

builtInProperties.name: MSIUSEREALADMINDETECTION
builtInProperties.description: Request installer use actual user info when setting AdminUser

builtInProperties.name: MSIUNINSTALLSUPERSEDEDCOMPONENTS
builtInProperties.description: Installer can unregister and uninstall redundant components

builtInProperties.name: MsiWin32AssemblySupport
builtInProperties.description: File version of sxs.dll on systems supporting Win32 assemblies

builtInProperties.name: MyPicturesFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the Pictures folder

builtInProperties.name: NetHoodFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the NetHood folder

builtInProperties.name: NOCOMPANYNAME
builtInProperties.description: Suppresses automatic setting of COMPANYNAME property

builtInProperties.name: NOUSERNAME
builtInProperties.description: Suppresses automatic setting of USERNAME property

builtInProperties.name: OLEAdvtSupport
builtInProperties.description: Set if OLE supports the Windows Installer

builtInProperties.name: OriginalDatabase
builtInProperties.description: Installer sets this to launched-from database

builtInProperties.name: OutOfDiskSpace
builtInProperties.description: Insufficient disk space to accommodate the installation

builtInProperties.name: OutOfNoRbDiskSpace
builtInProperties.description: Insufficient disk space with rollback turned off

builtInProperties.name: ParentOriginalDatabase
builtInProperties.description: Set for installations run by Concurrent Installation action

builtInProperties.name: ParentProductCode
builtInProperties.description: Set for installations that a Concurrent Installation action runs

builtInProperties.name: PATCH
builtInProperties.description: Setting this property applies a patch

builtInProperties.name: PersonalFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the Documents folder for the current user

builtInProperties.name: PhysicalMemory
builtInProperties.description: Size of installed RAM in megabytes

builtInProperties.name: PIDKEY
builtInProperties.description: Part of the Product ID that the user enters

builtInProperties.name: PIDTemplate
builtInProperties.description: String used as template for the PIDKEY property

builtInProperties.name: Preselected
builtInProperties.description: Features are already selected

builtInProperties.name: PRIMARYFOLDER
builtInProperties.description: Allows author to designate a primary folder for installation

builtInProperties.name: PrimaryVolumePath
builtInProperties.description: Path of volume that PRIMARYFOLDER property designates

builtInProperties.name: PrimaryVolumeSpaceAvailable
builtInProperties.description: Total number of bytes available on primary volume

builtInProperties.name: PrimaryVolumeSpaceRemaining
builtInProperties.description: Total bytes remaining on primary volume if features installed

builtInProperties.name: PrimaryVolumeSpaceRequired
builtInProperties.description: Total bytes required by currently selected features on primary volume

builtInProperties.name: PrintHoodFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the PrintHood folder

builtInProperties.name: Privileged
builtInProperties.description: Runs an installation with elevated privileges

builtInProperties.name: ProductCode
builtInProperties.description: A unique identifier for a specific product release (Required)

builtInProperties.name: ProductID
builtInProperties.description: Full Product ID after a successful validation

builtInProperties.name: ProductLanguage
builtInProperties.description: Numeric language identifier (LANGID) for the database (Required)

builtInProperties.name: ProductName
builtInProperties.description: Human readable name of an application (Required)

builtInProperties.name: ProductState
builtInProperties.description: Set to installed state of a product

builtInProperties.name: ProductVersion
builtInProperties.description: String format of product version as numeric value (Required)

builtInProperties.name: ProgramFiles64Folder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to predefined 64-bit Program Files folder

builtInProperties.name: ProgramFilesFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to predefined 32-bit Program Files folder

builtInProperties.name: ProgramMenuFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the Program Menu folder

builtInProperties.name: PROMPTROLLBACKCOST
builtInProperties.description: Action if there is insufficient disk space for installation

builtInProperties.name: REBOOT
builtInProperties.description: Forces or suppresses a restart

builtInProperties.name: REBOOTPROMPT
builtInProperties.description: Suppresses the display of prompts for restarts to the user

builtInProperties.name: RecentFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the Recent folder

builtInProperties.name: RedirectedDllSupport
builtInProperties.description: Set if system supports Isolated Components

builtInProperties.name: REINSTALL
builtInProperties.description: List of features to be reinstalled

builtInProperties.name: REINSTALLMODE
builtInProperties.description: String containing letters that specify type of reinstall to perform

builtInProperties.name: RemoteAdminTS
builtInProperties.description: Set when system is remote administration server running Terminal Server

builtInProperties.name: REMOVE
builtInProperties.description: List of features to be removed

builtInProperties.name: ReplacedInUseFiles
builtInProperties.description: Set if installer installs over file being held in use

builtInProperties.name: RESUME
builtInProperties.description: Resumed installation

builtInProperties.name: RollbackDisabled
builtInProperties.description: Installer sets this when rollback is disabled

builtInProperties.name: ROOTDRIVE
builtInProperties.description: Default drive for an installation

builtInProperties.name: ScreenX
builtInProperties.description: Width of the screen in pixels

builtInProperties.name: ScreenY
builtInProperties.description: Height of the screen in pixels

builtInProperties.name: SendToFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the SendTo folder for the current user

builtInProperties.name: SEQUENCE
builtInProperties.description: A table that has the sequence table schema

builtInProperties.name: ServicePackLevel
builtInProperties.description: Version number of the operating system service pack

builtInProperties.name: ServicePackLevelMinor
builtInProperties.description: Minor version number of the operating system service pack

builtInProperties.name: SharedWindows
builtInProperties.description: Set when the system is operating as Shared Windows

builtInProperties.name: ShellAdvtSupport
builtInProperties.description: Set if the shell supports feature advertising

builtInProperties.name: SHORTFILENAMES
builtInProperties.description: Causes short file names to be used

builtInProperties.name: SourceDir
builtInProperties.description: Root directory that contains the source files

builtInProperties.name: StartMenuFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the Start menu folder

builtInProperties.name: StartupFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the Startup folder

builtInProperties.name: System16Folder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to folder for 16-bit system DLLs

builtInProperties.name: System64Folder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the predefined System64 folder

builtInProperties.name: SystemFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the System folder for the current user

builtInProperties.name: SystemLanguageID
builtInProperties.description: Default language identifier for the system

builtInProperties.name: TARGETDIR
builtInProperties.description: Specifies the root destination directory for installation

builtInProperties.name: TempFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the Temp folder

builtInProperties.name: TemplateFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the Template folder for the current user

builtInProperties.name: TerminalServer
builtInProperties.description: Set when system is server running Terminal Server role service

builtInProperties.name: TextHeight
builtInProperties.description: Height of characters in logical units

builtInProperties.name: Time
builtInProperties.description: The current time

builtInProperties.name: TRANSFORMS
builtInProperties.description: List of transforms to be applied to a database

builtInProperties.name: TRANSFORMSATSOURCE
builtInProperties.description: Informs installer that transforms reside at source

builtInProperties.name: TRANSFORMSSECURE
builtInProperties.description: Setting to 1 informs installer transforms are cached locally

builtInProperties.name: TTCSupport
builtInProperties.description: Indicates if OS supports using .ttc (true type font collections) files

builtInProperties.name: UILevel
builtInProperties.description: Indicates the user interface level

builtInProperties.name: UpdateStarted
builtInProperties.description: Set when changes to the system have begun for this installation

builtInProperties.name: UpgradeCode
builtInProperties.description: A GUID that represents a related set of products

builtInProperties.name: UPGRADINGPRODUCTCODE
builtInProperties.description: Set by installer when upgrade removes an application

builtInProperties.name: USERNAME
builtInProperties.description: User who is performing the installation

builtInProperties.name: UserLanguageID
builtInProperties.description: Default language identifier of the current user

builtInProperties.name: UserSID
builtInProperties.description: Set according to security identifier (SID) of the user

builtInProperties.name: VersionDatabase
builtInProperties.description: Numeric database version of the current installation

builtInProperties.name: VersionMsi
builtInProperties.description: Version of Windows Installer run during installation

builtInProperties.name: VersionNT
builtInProperties.description: Version number for the operating system

builtInProperties.name: VersionNT64
builtInProperties.description: Version number for OS if running on 64-bit computer

builtInProperties.name: VirtualMemory
builtInProperties.description: Amount of available page file space in megabytes

builtInProperties.name: WindowsBuild
builtInProperties.description: Build number of the operating system

builtInProperties.name: WindowsFolder
builtInProperties.description: Full path to the Windows folder

builtInProperties.name: WindowsVolume
builtInProperties.description: Volume of the Windows folder
